ygData.subject: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Do these skills ever go up at all?   I mean, they are not listed in the skill list to put points into and I ve never seen the skill increase through
ygData.messageBody:
Do these skills ever go "up" at all?
�
I mean, they are not listed in the skill list to "put points into" and I've
never seen the skill increase through usage.
�
I have built a Halfling Druid, who has these abilities.� Am I to expect that
these abilities will work just as well now as they will when I attain level
20?
�
Also, has anyone noticed that sometimes the "Sneak" skill just doesn't
work?� You hit Sneak and you continue to walk/run at normal speed?� Then it
becomes available to use it again and you try again etc.� Sooner or later it
"works."
�
To top it off, how do you know if it's "really" working?
�
I've had aggressive monsters run right past me while I was sneaking, only to
have them see me on other occasions.� Same monsters.
�
These are very interesting skills, but I need to know how they really work!
�
Thanks,
Travis
travis@... <mailto:travis@...>
